title: Where To Get Free Pumpkin Treats On October 26
text:
Photo: Shutterstock

Saturday is National Pumpkin Day, a pretend holiday that matters because you can eat some things for free. Here are the pumpkin-themed freebies and discounts, in order of worth-it-ness.

Free Stuff

Baskin-Robbins: Free scoop of pumpkin ice cream via the app.

Biggby Coffee: Free ‘Chumpkin,’ which is a pumpkin chai drink and not an Urban Dictionary entry, via the rewards app.

Krispy Kreme: Free plain pumpkin spice doughnut if you sign up for a rewards account.

Other Deals

Smoothie King: BOGO pumpkin smoothies.

7-Eleven: $US1 ($1) pumpkin spice latte, any size, on the Rewards app.

Steak and Shake: Free pumpkin spice milkshake with a purchase and the rewards app.

Dunkin: 10 pumpkin doughnut holes for $US2 ($3).

Bath & Body Works: Half off certain pumpkin-scented products.

Carvel: $US2 ($3) off cakes and “holiday novelties” with a coupon.

Edible Arrangements: 20% off the pumpkin doughnut arrangement with code APPLE.

Unfortunately the Starbucks PSL is still full price.

Also, according to my barista, I’m the only one who calls it a “PSL” when ordering.

Deals via Promocodes.com.

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
